keyword: how many calories are in a sausage and egg mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage and Egg McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a sausage and egg mcmuffin (about 480 kcal), plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage and Egg McMuffin?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage and Egg McMuffin provides ~480 kcal and ~21 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a sausage and egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for one standard serving.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a sausage and egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 30 g carbs, 21 g protein, 31 g fat (11 g saturated).

faqs.q: Is the sausage and egg mcmuffin high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 830 mg sodium per mcmuffin—nearly half the daily recommended limit.

faqs.q: How does cheese affect calories in a sausage and egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: The included American cheese adds ~50 kcal; extra cheese increases it further.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie sausage and egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes—skip the sausage or use turkey sausage to cut ~200 kcal.
